channel.title: Very basic client launcher
channel.description:
Got bored at 4 am and decided to write a simple client launcher just to release. This is very basic & noob-friendly.
I downloaded a random PI client to show you how you implement the client to the launcher.
Download: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52228169/Client%20Launcher%20by%20fizin.rar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/52228169/Client%20Launcher%20by%20fizin.rar[/url]
[img]http://puu.sh/dwL1r/5cf9a50025.png[/img]
Configuration class. [img]http://puu.sh/dwL5o/47e6b896dd.png[/img]
If you jar the applet the main class would be 'Launcher'
Won't be hard to add it to load ur jar from web and launch if you want [code]Runtime.getRunTime().exec("java -jar path/client.jar");[/code]

item.title: Very basic client launcher
item.dc:creator: @bugrakyuz bugrakyuz
item.description:
@bugrakyuz wrote:

Hey I’m kinda noobish at this ps thing? Can you help me out?. I searched up on internet and failed a lot. I want a normal runescape but only me since I cannot afford membership anymore

Read full topic

item.title: Very basic client launcher
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

Bowser jr:

Have those variables in a config file that your program loads on startup. Do RSPS-makers do anything right?

I did mention that it’s noob friendly.

Read full topic
